hedline.hl2: LaTasha White and Leland Richards Jr.

block.p: LaTasha White and Leland Richards Jr. were married last evening at Belle Voir Manor in Bensalem, Pa. The Rev. William Lee, a Baptist minister, officiated.

Mrs. Richards, 27, is a vice president for stock sales at Goldman Sachs in New York. She graduated from the University of Virginia. Her mother, Dr. LaLura White of Chicago, is an obstetrician and gynecologist at Mercy Hospital there.
LaTasha White and Leland Richards Jr. were married Saturday evening at Belle Voir Manor in Bensalem, Pa. The Rev. William Lee, a Baptist minister, officiated.
LaTasha White and Leland Richards Jr. were married last evening at Belle Voir Manor in Bensalem, Pa. The Rev. William Lee, a Baptist minister, officiated.

Mrs. Richards, 27, is a vice president for stock sales at Goldman Sachs in New York. She graduated from the University of Virginia. Her mother, Dr. LaLura White of Chicago, is an obstetrician and gynecologist at Mercy Hospital there.

Mr. Richards, 37, is an investment banking consultant for D. B. Zwirn & Company, a hedge fund in New York. He graduated from Pratt Institute, and received an M.B.A. from Boston University. His mother, Rhoda Johnson of Boston, is a manager of the AIDS Program for the Boston Public Health Commission.
The bridegroom's first marriage ended in divorce.
